title: ProtonMail acquires email alias startup SimpleLogin
content:
As reported by TechCrunch, ProtonMail, an E2E encrypted webmail service, has bought SimpleLogin. The France-based startup offers an open-source service for creating email aliases for users to hide their email addresses when utilizing digital services.

more…

The post ProtonMail acquires email alias startup SimpleLogin appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: ProtonMail acquires SimpleLogin, a service for creating email aliases for users to hide their email address when utilizing digital services.
